title: Ready, Set, Snow
caption: Ready, Set, Snow
desc: Far above the clouds, an adrenaline-seeking skier glides past the jagged Crater Rock on Mount Hood, in the US state of Oregon. He's practising a relatively new sport known as speed riding, which is similar to paragliding but with more emphasis on speed than altitude. Skiers with parachute-like 'wings' launch downhill at high speed, navigating runs partly on skis and partly in the air.
copyright: Alex Peterson speed riding on the south side of Mount Hood, Oregon, USA (Â© Richard Hallman/DEEPOL by plainpicture)
